summary: The story of a family that suffers a tragedy, but perseveres and finds redemption through each other and their work - making art.
cast: Francesca Woodman|George Woodman|Betty Woodman|Charles Woodman|Patricia Sawin|Edwin Frank|Sloan Rankin|Catherine Chermayeff|Sabina Mirri|Benjamin|Glenn Palmer-Smith|Robert Kushner|Alexander Woodman|Andrea Woodman
director: Director: Scott Willis (as C. Scott Willis)
title: Los Woodmans
